member.summary: Gets or sets the current image zoom factor.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current translation of the image scene in the control client space.

member.summary: Notifies about the value change of the SizeMode property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the current size handling mode of the control.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the ZoomingVideoBoxBase class.

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.ZoomingVideoBoxBase.GetMaxZoom
member.summary: Returns the maximum allowed zoom value for the currently used display technology and image size.

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.ZoomingVideoBoxBase.ChangeZoom(System.Int32,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Changes the current zoom amount in the control.
member.param: Number of zoom change steps (positive to zoom in, negative to zoom out).
Point in the control client space that should stay in the same place after this operation.

member.name: T:VideoBoxBase.ZoomingVideoBoxBase
member.summary: Base class for implementing ZoomingVideoBox control, adding manual zoom manipulation capability to the VideoBox control.

member.name: T:VideoBoxBase.ZoomingVideoBoxMode
member.summary: Specifies the size handling mode of the ZoomingVideoBox control.

member.name: T:View3D.View3DGridDisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies the coordinate system measuring grid display mode used in the View3DBox scene visualization.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DGridDisplayMode.YZ
member.summary: Measurement grid is displayed on the plane containing Y and Z axes.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DGridDisplayMode.XY
member.summary: Measurement grid is displayed on the plane containing X and Y axes.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DGridDisplayMode.XZ
member.summary: Measurement grid is displayed on the plane containing X and Z axes.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DGridDisplayMode.None
member.summary: Measurement grid is not displayed.

member.name: T:View3D.View3DProjectionMode
member.summary: Specifies the view/projection mode used by the View3DBox control to present its scene.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DProjectionMode.OrthoLeft
member.summary: Displaying the scene from the left with orthogonal projection.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DProjectionMode.OrthoBack
member.summary: Displaying the scene from the back with orthogonal projection.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DProjectionMode.OrthoTop
member.summary: Displaying the scene from the top with orthogonal projection.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DProjectionMode.Perspective
member.summary: Displaying scene in free perspective mode.

member.name: T:View3D.View3DWorldOrientation
member.summary: Specifies the world space coordinate system type used by the View3DBox control to display its scene.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DWorldOrientation.LHYUp
member.summary: Left-hand coordinate system with Y axis point up.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DWorldOrientation.LHZUp
member.summary: Left-hand coordinate system with Z axis point up.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DWorldOrientation.RHYUp
member.summary: Right-hand coordinate system with Y axis point up.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DWorldOrientation.RHZUp
member.summary: Right-hand coordinate system with Z axis point up.

member.name: T:View3D.View3DColoringMode
member.summary: Specifies the point cloud points automatic coloring mode.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DColoringMode.ZAxis
member.summary: Automatic scale coloring of points based on the position along the Z axis.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DColoringMode.YAxis
member.summary: Automatic scale coloring of points based on the position along the Y axis.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DColoringMode.XAxis
member.summary: Automatic scale coloring of points based on the position along the X axis.

member.name: F:View3D.View3DColoringMode.Solid
member.summary: No automatic coloring, points are displayed with solid color.

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxBase.PointToControlSpace(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Computes the location of the specified image pixel into control coordinates.
member.param: Coordinates of the image pixel.
member.returns: Location in the control client space that represents the specified image pixel.

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxBase.PointToImageSpace(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Computes the location of the specified control point into currently displayed image coordinates (in its current size state).
member.param: Point coordinates in the control space.
member.returns: Equivalent point coordinates in the image space.

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxBase.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a new instance of the VideoBoxBase class.

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxBase.OnImageSizeChanged
member.summary: Called after the size of the displayed image has been changed (because of setting a new image with different dimensions).

member.name: M:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxBase.OnGraphicSystemInitialized
member.summary: Called after the underlying display technology system was initialized.

member.name: T:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxBase
member.summary: Base class for implementing the VideoBox control.

member.name: T:VideoBoxBase.ImagePixelType
member.summary: Specifies the image pixel data type for image data.

member.name: T:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxDisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies the underlying display technology mode for the VideoBox control.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxDisplayMode.DirectX
member.summary: Control will use DirectX to display its content with hardware acceleration.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxDisplayMode.GDI
member.summary: Control will use GDI to display its content.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxDisplayMode.Auto
member.summary: Control will attempt to start in DirectX mode when the technology is available on the local system.

member.name: T:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxSizeMode
member.summary: Determines the image size handling mode of the VideoBox control.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxSizeMode.Zoom
member.summary: Image is stretched and centered to fill the control client area without modifying the image size proportions.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxSizeMode.CenterImage
member.summary: Image is displayed in its original size but centered in the control client area.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxSizeMode.StretchImage
member.summary: Image stretched to fill the entire control client area.

member.name: F:VideoBoxBase.VideoBoxSizeMode.Normal
member.summary: Image displayed without changes.
